mapper.select: SELECT recent.sn, recent.data_reg_dt, recent.pm10, recent.pm25, recent.tem, recent.hum, recent.iaq, mng.dvc_mng_nm, state.comm_badn, state.sensor_badn, state.power_badn, state.power_st FROM aircok_device.dvc_recent_data AS recent JOIN( SELECT * FROM aircok_device.dvc_st ) AS state ON state.sn = recent.sn JOIN( SELECT sn, dvc_mng_nm FROM aircok.dvc_mng ) AS mng ON mng.sn = recent.sn WHERE state.sn IN ( SELECT UNNEST(STRING_TO_ARRAY(dvc_list, ',')) FROM aircok.user_tb WHERE user_id = #{id} );
